name: Ouction
description:
/// Story

After buying slave elves at an auction,
restrain and rear them in a confinement room.
When rearing the elves, you can abuse, rape and impregnate them.

If you abuse them, you can sell them for a high price.
If you impregnate the elves, you can sell them for an even higher price.

Of course, you can make the elves you impregnate give birth.
Finally, aim for pee spraying.


/// Dots

This is a dot animation work.
If you see this work in its actual size,
it is made up of extremely fine dots.
We have poured our soul into each and every dot.

The insertion and vaginal scenes, as well as the birth scenes, are expressed in an erotic way.
Further, as all the scenes are in animation,
this is sure to excite you even more.

Of course, it also includes secret tricks, so
you can enjoy it as a simple dot animation work.
